articles.title: Any Slight Attempt to Patronize Lee Myung Bak Will Entail Miserable Consequences: FM Spokesman
articles.content:
Any Slight Attempt to Patronize Lee Myung Bak Will Entail Miserable Consequences: FM Spokesman
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Sunday issued the following statement: 
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of south Korea again committed the gravest provocation quite contrary to the desire and wishes of the Korean people and the world people for peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The Lee group kicked off war exercises in collusion with outside forces during the period of mourning over the great loss to the nation. Not content with this, it committed such shuddering crime as hurting the dignity of the most sacred supreme leadership of the DPRK, touching off the towering anger of its army and people. 
					
					 The Lee group is hordes of wicked traitors with whom Koreans can never live under the same sky as it has gone crazy with  the anti-DPRK confrontation racket while hurling without hesitation slanders and calumnies at the great leaders whom the Korean people trust and follow like Heaven. 
					
					 The Lee group claims the DPRK-targeted war exercises censured and condemned by the whole world are annual defensive ones. But, the recent most hideous provocation fully disclosed the aggressive nature of the enemy whetting swords with a sinister intention to attack the DPRK. 
					
					 Challenging the June 15 era of reunification, the Lee group drove the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase and blocked all sorts of dialogue including the six-party talks, escalating tension only. It is the enemy of the nation and a source of war. 
					
					 The Lee group made desperate efforts to prevent an atmosphere of dialogue from being created on the Korean Peninsula. When there is a sign of the DPRK-U.S. talks making progress, the group is making last-ditch efforts to upset it in a bid to prolong its remaining days. 
					
					 It is impossible to ensure peace and stability on the peninsula and the region, to say nothing of improved inter-Korean relations, and dark clouds of war are bound to hang over it as long as the Lee group whose only means of living is confrontation with compatriots is allowed to stay in power. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have already sentenced to death the Lee group cursed and denounced by progressive mankind for committing thrice-cursed crimes against the Korean nation. They will mete out a merciless punishment of their own style to it. 
					
					 Defending the leader at the cost of one's life is the supreme principle of the DPRK which remains unchanged and allows not the slightest compromise no matter how the world may change.
					
					 If anyone is going to back the group more dead than alive as it is awaiting a severe punishment by history, he is bound to perish for adding fuel to the fire.

articles.title: Spokesman for CPRK Slams Hooliganism Committed by Lee Myung Bak Group
articles.content:
Spokesman for CPRK Slams Hooliganism Committed by Lee Myung Bak Group
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea on Sunday issued a statement denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for committing the most hideous hooliganism recently.
					 Not content with inciting extreme hatred and hostility toward fellow compatriots in the north, the Lee group carelessly hung portraits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu who are the destiny of the Korean people on walls and doors, scrawling unspeakable defamatory words below them, the statement says, and goes on:
					
					 The human history records many ill-famed tyrants and warmongers but does not know such worst cacodemons in the world as the Lee group which openly committed such evils against fellow compatriots.
					
					 This is the most hideous unethical acts stunning the world in the civilized era in the 21st century and the height of thrice-cursed barbarism.
					
					 That is why the army and people of the DPRK are shouting with towering indignation "Let's finish off all those who hurt the dignity of our supreme leadership", "It is not enough to kill them with a millstone", "They should be hung to death" and "We should turn their bases into seas in flames".
					
					 Voices are growing stronger among south Korean public circles chiding and condemning the Lee group's barbarism, terming it "dangerous reckless acts quite contrary to the faith of the compatriots in the north who regard the supreme leader as their life and soul."
					
					 The Lee group committed again such thrice-cursed crimes against the compatriots grieving over the loss of the father of the nation. These shuddering barbarities clearly prove that they are the sworn enemy.
					
					 The recent most hideous provocation was not something committed by individual service members of the puppet army.
					
					 This was deliberate provocation orchestrated by traitor Lee Myung Bak steeped in anti-DPRK confrontation hysteria to the marrow of his bones and brass hats such as Defense Minister of south Korea Kim Kwan Jin and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff Jong Sung Jo who are heinous war gangsters.
					
					 The above-said reckless acts are nothing but their last-ditch efforts to drive the south Korean people and puppet army into the confrontation with the DPRK and a war for invading it by maximizing hostility toward it, rally conservative forces in the run-up to the "general election" and thus stay in power.
					
					 It is long since the Lee group was reduced to human scum as it has been hell-bent on confrontation.
					
					 It was Lee and his group who masterminded the frantic firing at the boards symbolic of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK in drill grounds of the puppet army and reserve forces last year. It was again the group of traitors who ordered puppet officers to paste huge slogans hurting the dignity of the DPRK at barracks, gates and walls and their soldiers to shout anti-communist slogans after getting up and before going to bed and during their training and mealtime.
					
					 The recent behaviors of the Lee group brought to daylight that though it is letting loose such rhetoric as "dialogue" and "flexibility," it is working with bloodshot eyes and malice to do harm to the headquarters of the DPRK behind scene.
					
					 The DPRK will give such ignorant and uncouth confrontation fanatics as the Lee group no space to remain on this land, much less dealing with it.
					
					 The act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is nothing but frenzy which deserves severe punishment as it is to do harm to the lives of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The hearts of the service personnel and people of the DPRK are burning with towering anger and resentment at the above-said hideous provocation and firm resolution to annihilate the enemy.
					
					 The world will clearly see how they will erupt. Leader, give us an order!
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are fully ready to wipe out the enemy, keeping pace with the dynamic footsteps of the great illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The sacred war has already been declared.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group, hideous human poisonous herbs, sources of all sorts of evils and group of traitors for all ages, will never be able to escape the most miserable fate as the primary target of the nation's judgment.
					
					 The DPRK will punish without mercy anyone who hurts the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK even a bit as solemnly declared in the statement issued by the spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The group of traitors should anticipate a terrible heavy fire to be made by the KPA like a roar of a tiger in Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Servicepersons and People Vow to Wipe Out Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Servicepersons and People Vow to Wipe Out Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The servicepersons and people in Pyongyang packed Kim Il Sung Square Sunday to vow to wage a sacred war of merciless retaliation to wipe out the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who defamed the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 The venue was pervaded with the hatred and will of the people from all walks of life to wipe out the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and its citadels which hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system which the army and people are cherishing as the most sacred and precious one, not content with rubbing salts in the wounds of fellow countrymen who suffered the great loss to the nation. 
					
					 Attending the rally were officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of the fields of science, education, literature and art, public health and media, working people, youths and students in Pyongyang, overseas compatriots staying in the homeland and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and members of the military attaches corps here and foreign guests.
					
					 The statement of a spokesman for the Korean People's Army Supreme Command was read out to be followed by speeches. 
					
					 Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who doubles as chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, spoke on behalf of the WPK. 
					
					 He said that all the people across the country are waiting for an order to destroy the enemies. They are getting themselves ready to wipe out the Lee group with an all-out merciless war for retaliation, he added.
					
					 The group of gangsters' act of slandering and defaming the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is a racket as the thrice-cursed enemies, scum of history worse than animals, dare point the finger at the sun, he said, and went on:
					
					 The confrontation moves directly orchestrated by the Lee group are the most evil ones putting the successive chief executives into the shade. 
					
					 We will turn the sea in flames on Yonphyong Island into a sea in flames of Chongwadae, the sea in flames of Chongwadae into a sea in flames to blow up the citadel of the group of traitors and thus wipe it out to the last man so that it can not hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership and the inviolable system of the DPRK. 
					
					 KPA Colonel General O Kum Chol, deputy chief of the General Staff, said on behalf of KPA service members:
					
					 The KPA will find out the mastermind of the gravest crime and punish them whether they are in Inchon, Seoul, Jeju Island, U.S. or any other place of the earth and make the den of mad dogs their grave.
					
					 They will be made to be aware of the weapons of Songun and real sacred war. The world will witness what a miserable end they will meet in the face of the merciless sacred battle of all the service persons of the KPA who would turn out to defend their leader, their Supreme Commander. 
					
					 Kim Hyok Nam, worker of the Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory, speaking on behalf of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, said that south Korean people call Lee Myung Bak rat-Myung Bak as he was born in a foreign land and grew up wandering about in Seoul markets like a rat. He vowed to mercilessly kill dog-like Lee with the weapons of Songun, iron hammer and sharp sickle. 
					
					 All the red guards members are waiting for an order to storm Chongwadae where rat-Myung Bak is squatting and wipe out the base of anti-DPRK plots and moves for a war, he added.
					
					 Hong Kang Min, a student of Kim Il Sung University, speaking on behalf of youths and students, called for becoming five million human rifles and human bombs for defending the dear respected Kim Jong Un, destiny of the Koreans and banner of all victories. 
					
					 The huge ranks of the youths demonstrating their might as reserve combat units and special detachment of the Supreme Commander will take the lead in the indiscriminate sacred war of retaliation of our own style the core of which is physical strike and fully defeat traitor Lee and his military hooligans and give full play to the mettle of Korean youth vanguard who have grown up under the care of brilliant commanders of Mt. Paektu, he stressed. 
					
					 The participants shouted "Kill Myung Bak," "Strike military warmongers," "Tear apart Lee Myung Bak to death in the name of the nation!" and "Let us destroy the Lee group of traitors!"
					
					 At the end of the speeches there was a demonstration march.
					
					ã€€The demonstrators marched past the square with the determination to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche which was started on Mt. Paektu and the historic cause of national reunification under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, shouting slogans such as "Let Us Become Rifles and Bombs Defending the Dear Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un at the Risk of Our Lives!"

articles.title: In-principle Stand of the DPRK Reiterated
articles.content:
In-principle Stand of the DPRK Reiterated
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegate re-clarified its in-principle stand in a speech at the Plenary Session of the Geneva Disarmament Conference on Feb. 28.
					 The hegemonic policy based on strength and the use of force and nuclear threat and blackmail pursuant to it are openly advocated and carried into practice at the international arena, he said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea stage the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises with huge armed forces involved.
					
					 As seen by the fact, it is the U.S. and south Korea that wreck peace on the Korean Peninsula, escalate the tension there and destroy the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Nevertheless, south Korea is busying with preparations for holding the "nuclear security summit" in late March.
					
					 It is astonishing that discussions of the nuclear security issue are scheduled in south Korea, the nuclear advance base of the U.S. and the largest nuclear powder magazine in the world.
					
					 Dialogue and confrontation are incompatible.
					
					 Any country truly wanting to see the security on the Korean Peninsula should not lend an ear to sophism of the south Korean authorities but have a good understanding that improved north-south relations as well as peace and security in Northeast Asia are guaranteed by the implementation of the north-south declarations.
					
					 Anyone is not entitled to talk this or that about the peaceful use of nuclear energy, the legitimate right of a sovereign state.
					
					 The uranium enrichment in the DPRK is peaceful nuclear activities for the production of electricity from A to Z.
					
					 Availing itself of this opportunity, the DPRK delegation re-clarifies its stand that it totally rejects UNSC Resolutions 1718 and 1874 and will not be bound to them.
					
					 The nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula was spawned by the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the U.S. nuclear war threat to it. It is the U.S. that has responsibility and capacity to remove its root cause. 
					
					 Invariable is the stand of the DPRK on the resumption of the six-party talks without preconditions and the implementation of the September 19 Statement based on the principle of simultaneous action.
					
					 The DPRK regards it as the noble duty to defend the peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the region and promote co-prosperity and will make every possible effort to this end.

articles.title: Intel' Railways Meeting of Asian Countries of ORC Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Intel' Railways Meeting of Asian Countries of ORC Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The international railways meeting of Asian countries of the Organization of Railways Cooperation for agreeing upon foreign trade freight transport volume for 2012 was held here from Feb. 28 to March 2.
					 Attending there were delegations of the DPRK, China, Russia, Mongolia, Vietnam and Kazakhstan.
					
					 The participants first observed a moment's silence in memory of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Im Chol Ung, deputy minister of Railways, in a congratulatory speech at the meeting said that Asian countries have closely cooperated with each other to increase foreign trade freight transport volume in the past.
					
					 He stressed the need to boost exchange in the future to deepen bonds of friendship.
					
					 The meeting, divided into panels, summed up the fulfilment of the 2011 plan for foreign trade freight transport among Asian countries.
					
					 It agreed upon foreign trade freight transport volume for 2012 for economic development of those countries participating in the meeting and discussed technical issues to implement the agreement.
					
					 A relevant protocol was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: More Youths Volunteer for Military Service in DPRK
articles.content:
More Youths Volunteer for Military Service in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The number of the young people volunteering to join or rejoin the Korean People's Army is rapidly increasing in the capital city of Pyongyang after a spokesman for the KPA Supreme Command announced a statement over the south Korean regime's hideous provocation to the DPRK.
					 On March 3 alone, more than 200,000 youths at industrial establishments petitioned to join or rejoin the army. They include young workers of Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, Pyongyang Hosiery Factory, Rangnang Disabled Soldiers' Plastic Daily Necessities Factory and Tudan Duck Farm. 
					
					 Ri Kun Chol, first secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, told KCNA:
					
					 "It is time to go over into action now that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, human dregs, again hurt the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					
					 Upon hearing the statement young people in the city are vying with each other to volunteer for military service. The volunteers grow more and more in number with passage of time. Once the respected Supreme Commander gives us an order for action, we will destroy the Lee group at once."

articles.title: Korean People Wait for Order to Start Fight for Revenge
articles.content:
Korean People Wait for Order to Start Fight for Revenge
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- All people in the DPRK are enraged at the recent anti-DPRK provocation by the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea.
					 They are now anxiously waiting for an order to launch a vengeful war, with their strong will to punish all of them who again defamed the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					
					 Ho Mong, a man residing in Minhung-dong, Moranbong District, Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					 "Lee Myung Bak is running amuck like a puppy knowing no fear of tiger. I am eager to cut at him and his lackeys with my sharpened axe and see their blood."
					
					 Jang Jong Suk, a woman in Jungdok-dong, Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province, said:
					
					 "Being a woman, I am good at killing dogs. I wish I could go to Seoul and kill the dog called Myung Bak."
					
					 Pang Chang Ho, manager of a Nampho-based factory under the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation, said:
					
					  "I am over fifty but still full of vigor with which I served in the army. Whenever the group of traitors in south Korea did harm to the DPRK, I would feel my hands itching to strike them to death. It is hard to stand their provocation any longer. Now is the time to kill all of those traitors. I will personally extirpate Kim Kwan Jin and Jong Sung Jo and their descendents. I want our leadership to allow an all-people war for revenge." 
					
					 People from all walks of life have urged the party and government bodies to allow a nationwide vengeful war, with the resolution to turn the den of Lee Myung Bak into a sea of flames and throw its dirty ashes into the South Sea of Korea. 
					
					 University and college students are volunteering to join or rejoin the army, with intention to rush to Seoul and Inchon, once an order is given, and annihilate all of those who hurt the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership even a bit. 
					
					 This year's secondary school graduates across the country have met to volunteer for military service, vowing to stand in the van of the fight against the Lee group of traitors.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Condemned for Driving Situation of Korean Peninsula to Brink
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Condemned for Driving Situation of Korean Peninsula to Brink
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Korean Peninsula is now on the brink of war due to the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea, which kicked off anti-DPRK military exercises in league with the U.S. forces and again hurt the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					 Agreements adopted between the north and the south of Korea in the past call for removing confrontation between both sides through respect for each other's ideology and social system, halt to slandering each other and prevention of armed conflicts.
					
					 The DPRK initiated reasonable proposals for easing political and military confrontation between the north and the south and removing the source of war, thereby creating conditions favorable to national reconciliation, unity and reunification, and has done its utmost for their materialization.
					
					 But, traitor Lee Myung Bak totally denied the June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration soon after he came to power, and laid hurdles to opening of reunification-related events to be held jointly by nongovernmental organizations in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 The traitor, bereft of national conscience and concept of fellow nationals, openly declared an all-out confrontation against the DPRK, while insisting that cooperation would never improve the north-south relations.
					
					 Due to his heated confrontational moves, the Agreement on Reconciliation, Non-aggression, Cooperation and Exchange between North and South has become ineffective, including the articles on the military demarcation line in the West Sea of Korea in particular. 
					
					 In recent years such cases as "Cheonan" warship sinking and Yonphyong Island shelling took place one after another in the West Sea where the north and the south stand in acute military showdown, thus causing a touch-and-go situation. This was attributable to traitor Lee, a confrontation maniac seeking to realize his design for invasion of the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean people are fully determined to punish the Lee group of traitors, who has driven the north-south confrontation to an extreme phase and trampled upon the nation's desire for independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Rages at S. Korean Regime Run High among Workers of DPRK
articles.content:
Rages at S. Korean Regime Run High among Workers of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing the news of the hideous provocation committed again by south Korea's Lee Myung Bak regime against the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership, all workers at the Chollima Steel Complex in the DPRK hardly repress their surging indignation.
					 Ju Kyong Chol, a workshop head, told KCNA:
					
					 "The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors made another hideous provocation at a time when the Korean Peninsula is under the touch-and-go situation due to the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle military exercises jointly kicked off by the south Korean military and the U.S. forces.
					
					 The group's arch crime, committed when the DPRK was seized with grief over the demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, is still arousing anger from among the fellow countrymen.
					
					 We can no longer endure such provocations."
					
					 Ra U Gil, a member of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, said:
					
					 "Now that our own-style sacred war was declared against the group of traitors, we will turn out in the war with a hammer in one hand and a rifle in the other to wipe out the enemy.
					
					 Those who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK even a bit will find no breathing spell in this land and sky."

articles.title: DPRK People Vow to Annihilate S. Korean Traitors
articles.content:
DPRK People Vow to Annihilate S. Korean Traitors 
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA) in a statement released Friday disclosed that the internal affairs team of a south Korean military unit in Inchon carelessly hung portraits of the peerless great men born of Mt. Paektu on walls and doors, scrawling unspeakable defamatory words below them.
					 The news pushed the whole of the country into fury all at once, with the servicepersons and civilians keeping themselves on alert.
					
					 People throughout the country let loose their anger, shouting: 
					
					 "Deal a crushing blow to Lee Myung Bak!"
					
					 "Myung Bak should be ejected from the list of members of the nation."
					
					 "It is unimaginable that human dregs like Lee Myung Bak dare to slander the Sun."
					
					 "It is a shame and misfortune for the Korean nation to be with such mad dogs and human dregs as Lee Myung Bak."
					
					 "We, five million young people, will reduce Seoul to a sea of flames, once an order of the Supreme Command is given."
					
					 "Respected Supreme Commander, we can not stand any longer. Please give us an order for action."
					
					 "Once the respected Supreme Commander gives an order, we, workers, are enough to reduce traitor Lee Myung Bak's headquarters to ashes."
					
					 "Let us annihilate the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and their descendents with a sickle in one hand and rifle in the other." 
					
					 "Exterminate their kinsmen down to third generation."

articles.title: CPRF Officials, Indignant at S. Korean Regime's Provocation
articles.content:
CPRF Officials Indignant at S. Korean Regime's Provocation
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland (CPRF), warn south Korea's Lee Myung Bak and his lackeys of their fates, seized by rages at their hideous provocation against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 A CPRF Secretariat councilor, Hong Kwang Il, told KCNA:
					
					"If the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors are left intact, north-south relations will never be mended. All the Korean people will deal a crushing blow to it, which has driven the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse while swimming against the trend of the times."
					
					 A chief staff, Ri Jin U, said:
					
					"With 'unification of systems' as its aim, the group has committed all sorts of provocations against the DPRK soon after it came to power. Those provocations are just a challenge to the Korean nation's desire for peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula."
					
					 The deputy director of the Secretariat of the North Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, Pak Song Il, said:
					
					"Hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK still now in the mourning period is the worst of the crimes the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors has committed.
					
					 The prerequisite to improving the north-south relations and attaining the peaceful national reunification is to punish this group at an earlier date."

articles.title: Resentment of Korean People against S. Korean Regime at Height
articles.content:
Resentment of Korean People against S. Korean Regime at Height
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Lee Myung Bak regime's confrontation moves against the DPRK have reached the height.
					A spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA) in a statement released Friday disclosed that a south Korean military unit in Inchon carelessly hung portraits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu on walls and doors, scrawling unspeakable defamatory words below them.
					
					The news aroused the Korean people's resentment.
					
					Mun Yong Chol, chairman of the Poetry Sub-committee of the C.C., Writers Union of Korea, told KCNA:
					
					"Though the sky falls and the land sinks, we, Koreans will turn out to defend the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership at the cost of our lives. 
					
					Traitor Lee Myung Bak masterminded the idea of the recent provocations and Kim Kwan Jin, Jong Sung Jo and other warmongers of the puppet military adopted it as "state tasks" and spearheaded them. They are a group of political hooligans.
					
					The indiscreet act of a tiny handful of the traitors indicates that they are coming to an end."
					
					Paek Chun Yong, an official of the C.C., Democratic Women's Union of Korea, said that the puppet regime's provocation sparked off all the Korean women's resentment.
					
					"The Lee group's provocation against the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership can never be forgiven. I am anxious to storm Chongwadae and destroy traitor Lee Myung Bak at once," she added.

articles.title: Pyongyang Citizens Vow to Wage War of Retaliation
articles.content:
Pyongyang Citizens Vow to Wage War of Retaliation
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang citizens are now trembling with towering anger at the south Korean regime's recent provocation against the DPRK. 
					 "Nobody will be tolerated to hurt the dignity of our supreme leadership. Let's wipe out the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors."
					
					 Such angry shouts are heard in every part of the city. Loudspeaker cars in streets steadily are militant songs and indignation statements.
					
					 Many citizens including youth and students are volunteering to join or rejoin the army. 
					
					 According to an officer in charge of recruitment, the recruiting agency has been deluged with an increasing number of volunteers from Friday afternoon after a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army made public a statement to hit at the Lee group of traitors' provocation.
					
					 Among them was a whole family willing to take part in the retaliatory war holding arms.
					
					 Kang Won Gil, a resident in Pothonggang District who came to the agency together with his two sons and daughters-in-law, told KCNA: 
					
					 "Speaking cannot be communicated to Lee Myung Bak regime that has become a mad dog. We, all family will take part in the war of justice, holding arms to defend the headquarters of the revolution." 
					
					 Ro Ju Dok, a resident in Sosong District, Pyongyang, said:
					
					 "To fight in defence of the dignity of the country and the nation is duty of citizens." He petitioned to be allowed to rejoin the army.  
					
					 Yun Ok Myong, a worker of the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory in Pyongyang, told KCNA that she, unable to repress surging anger, rushed there with her husband after leaving her young daughter to mother.
					
					 "We will wear revolutionary uniforms and take revenge upon the group of hooligans who hurt the dignity of our supreme leadership," she said.

articles.title: Worst Provocation Ever in History of North-South Relations
articles.content:
Worst Provocation Ever in History of North-South Relations
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean regime's confrontation moves against the DPRK have come to the worst phase.
					 Recently traitor Lee Myung Bak initiated a hideous provocation against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, while Defence Minister Kim Kwan Jin and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff Jong Sung Jo spearheaded it as "state tasks".
					
					 The internal affairs team of a south Korean army unit in Inchon carelessly hung portraits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu on walls and doors, scrawling unspeakable defamatory words below them.
					
					 This is the worst provocation ever in the history of north-south relations.
					
					 The successive south Korea regimes, including the "Yusin" dictatorship, stood in confrontation with the DPRK, but they dared not to defame the dignity of its supreme leadership.
					
					 The recent incident lays bare the colors of the Lee group of traitors as confrontation maniacs and as hooligans bereft of elementary ethics.

articles.title: Songs of Revenge, Advance Resound in DPRK
articles.content:
Songs of Revenge, Advance Resound in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Songs of revenge and advance for annihilating the enemies are resounding in the DPRK. They are adding to the towering resentment of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					 Wartime songs in the 1950s including "Song of National Defence", "To Road for Decisive Battle" and "Song of Coast Artillerymen" are loudly sung among dependable ranks. Reflected in the songs is the revolutionary spirit to deal a merciless and retaliatory blow at the Lee Myung Bak group keen on the moves for igniting a war while hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, oblivious of the lesson of history.
					
					 Songs "The Country I Am Defending", "I Know It Now" and "For My Only Motherland" also reflect the firm determination of the army and people of the DPRK to defend the valuable country liberated by President Kim Il Sung and glorified by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, parents, brothers and sisters and the homes dear to them and wipe out vicious enemies to the last man.
					
					 "Let Us Become the General's Soldiers", "Let Us Meet at the Front" and other songs carrying with the unanimous aspiration of the young people are heard at the meetings for petitioning to join the Korean People's Army and meetings for pledging revenge across the country.
					
					 Resounding at loudspeaker cars running through the streets like shouts of the raging masses at the frantic moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and loudspeakers set up in different parts are songs calling for all-people resistance.
					
					 "Let Us Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Risk of Our Lives", "All Servicepersons and People Will Become Human Bullets and Bombs", "We Will Defend the Headquarters of the Revolution at the Risk of Our Lives" and other songs are pervaded with the faith and will of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution, the heart and destiny of Korea, although the earth breaks down and their bodies are torn to pieces.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Lee Myung Bak Group's Hideous Provocation
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Lee Myung Bak Group's Hideous Provocation 
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group's provocation against the DPRK has reached an intolerable point.
					They forced hooligans of the puppet army in Inchon City to dare commit the hideous provocation of slandering and defaming the portraits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 This was a rude bullying act plunging the situation on the Korean Peninsula into a catastrophic phase. This was also a treacherous act of escalating confrontation with the DPRK, an act which can no longer be overlooked.
					
					 The Lee group of traitors is made up of hooligans and the sworn enemies of the nation who commit only wrongdoings unimaginable with human brain.
					
					 There were the Yusin dictator who became notorious as he was obsessed with the confrontation with compatriots and the military fascist murderer and the political prostitute who were steeped in sycophancy to the U.S. to the marrow of their bones. But they did not dare hurt the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership.
					
					 It was because they knew that the army and the people of the DPRK regard the dignity of their supreme leadership as dignity and honor common to the nation which is more valuable than their own lives.
					
					 The supreme dignity of the army and the people of the DPRK is precisely the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They are the brilliant commanders who defended and glorified the sovereignty of the DPRK and the destiny of the nation from all forms of aggression by the imperialists, defenders of justice and great lodestars for the country's reunification.
					
					 They represent the mental pillar of the army and people of the DPRK and the banner of its eternal victory.
					
					 It is the spirit of annihilating enemies peculiar to the army and people of the DPRK to devotedly defend the supreme leadership and certainly settle accounts with those who hurt its dignity even though the sky may fall down and the earth break apart.
					
					 Not content with holding the war drills against the DPRK, the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors dare point the finger at the sun. The group is the sworn enemies of the Koreans and hideous traitors to the nation who deserve death. 
					
					 The army and the people are anxious to wage an all-people war of retaliation to mercilessly punish Lee Myung Bak, Kim Kwan Jin, Jong Sung Jo and all other traitors to the last man.
					
					 Time is running out for the group of traitors to stay under the sky.
					
					 The world will see what a miserable end the group will meet.

articles.title: To Finish off Traitor Lee Myung Bak Is Justice: KCNA Commentary:
articles.content:
To Finish off Traitor Lee Myung Bak Is Justice: KCNA Commentary:
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Heinous crimes in the history of the Korean nation are openly committed in south Korea.
					 It is beyond human imagination. It makes everybody shake with rage and resentment. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors perpetrated such crime as rubbing salt into the wounds of the compatriots in bitter sorrow over the great loss to the nation. Not content with this, the group committed such intolerable hooliganism as defaming the venerable image of the great father of the Korean nation. How can those mourners, all the servicepersons and people, in this land remain passive onlookers to this gangsterism?
					
					 When and where has any nation witnessed such thrice-cursed barbarism on this earth?
					
					 This is the worst of the atrocities committed on the earth as well as the most hideous provocation.
					
					 The eyes of all sons and daughters in the country are bloodshot with wailing. The tears of blood shed by them turned into a huge amount of bullets to be fired in retaliation.
					
					 Their pent-up grudge is now running high.
					
					 The whole world will soon know well that the DPRK's pledge of revenge is not an empty talk.
					
					 No one will be surprised to see such mad dogs as Lee Myung Bak, Kim Kwan Jin and Jong Sung Jo bombed to death or their heads to fall down on the ground. 
					
					 The DPRK has already declared a merciless holy war of its own style.
					
					 The KPA declared that it will chase them to settle accounts with them to the last, be they in Inchon or Seoul or elsewhere in the world.
					
					 Don't say this or that about means and form of this holy war. Don't argue about a war or terrorism.
					
					 To finish off traitors is justice and a historic task to be carried out unconditionally with whatever effort.
					
					 It is not only a holy war for freedom but the people's legitimate right to put a definite end to the misfortune of the Korean nation.
					
					 The DPRK's merciless sighting shots at the mad dogs will continue till its grudge is fully settled.
					
					 It will completely eliminate the barbarians so that the grudge of not only present generation but the generations to come is settled.
					
					 The mad dogs running amuck, unafraid of Heaven's punishment, will regret their birth on this earth.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blames Touch-and-Go Situation on Korean Peninsula on Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blames Touch-and-Go Situation on Korean Peninsula on Lee Myung Bak 
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A touch-and-go situation is now prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, triggering off towering grudge of the people in the DPRK. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are now swearing to wipe out the group of Lee Myung Bak, Kim Kwan Jin and Jong Sung Jo.
					
					 The Lee group of traitors is to blame for turning the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia into the most dangerous hotspot overnight.
					
					 Obsessed by escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen, Lee had temerity of defaming the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK which represents the life, destiny and future of the nation.
					
					 The Lee group's provocation is a thrice-cursed crime that presupposes a war. It deliberately and systematically escalated military tensions on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Aside from its crimes after coming to office, the group leveled guns at the mourners in the north, creating war-like atmosphere.
					
					 The puppet group, aligned with outsiders, constantly staged joint military drills.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula has been tense in the past but never before has such an acute phase of confrontation been created and such a big danger of a war prevailed as today, given the enemies' defamation of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 No one can vouch for peace and stability in Northeast Asia, to say nothing of the Korean Peninsula, now that dark clouds of a war hang over this land due to the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					
					 This has become clearer as the army and people of the DPRK vowed to launch an all-out war of retaliation to wipe out the group of traitors and its stooges.
					
					 The Lee group of traitors will be given no space to stay on earth as they have defamed the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership and pushed the regional situation to the brink of war.
					
					 The guns of the DPRK are leveling at human scum.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will deluge the matchless war maniacs and disgusting men with powerful fire so that they can not find even a place to get buried.

articles.title: U.S. Idea of Making "Pacific Century" for It Bound to Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Idea of Making "Pacific Century" for It Bound to Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. dream of making "Pacific Century" for it is no more than a daydream as it is aimed to put the Asian countries under its control and dominate the Pacific, observes Rodong Sinmun in a by-lined article Sunday. 
					 The above-said idea of the U.S. pursues a doctrine to enslave the peoples in the Asia-Pacific region and become an "emperor" in the region and a doctrine for world domination which calls for putting Asia under its control among other things in order to dominate the world, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 This is the basic goal of the Asia strategy pushed forward by the U.S. imperialists at present as it comprehensively deals with the wild ambition to invade the region long harbored by the successive ruling quarters.
					
					 Just as the U.S. scenario to remain the "only superpower in the world" is facing a great difficulty, its idea of making "Pacific century" for it is bound to go awry. The article cites facts to prove this fact.
					
					 Growing strong in Asia are the revolutionary forces capable of frustrating the U.S. imperialists' policy of aggression and finally driving them out of the region, it says, and goes on:
					
					 The socialist forces are growing stronger as they did before and the people are getting more awakened in the protracted anti-imperialist struggle. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists tested all new strategies and tactics for cracking down upon the anti-U.S. resistance forces through the Iraqi War. All of them were, however, frustrated by the actions of the anti-U.S. resistance forces and people.
					
					 A particularly serious bottleneck before the U.S. imperialists in executing their policy of aggression against Asia is shortage of armed forces.
					
					 The U.S. forces are short of weapons and troops despite the fact that a huge amount of funds was spent for "war on terrorism."    
					
					 Another difficulty for them is a long route for logistic supply. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists feel an acute shortage of supplies though most of their transport means in their country were used to meet the need for the transportation of supplies for just one front in the Mideast region.
					
					 It is beyond doubt in case they escalate the war of aggression into Asia, such difficulties will increase. 
					
					 The contradictions and conflict among imperialists will fester, rendering the U.S. imperialists further isolated from their allies.

articles.title: Those Who Hurt Dignity of Supreme Leadership of DPRK Will Not Be Able to Go Scot-free: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Those Who Hurt Dignity of Supreme Leadership of DPRK Will Not Be Able to Go Scot-free: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors will have to pay a thousand-fold dearer price for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and it will not escape forlorn wandering spirits.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday warns this in a bylined article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu are the suns of all the Koreans' destiny, lodestars of national reunification and benevolent fathers.
					
					 The wicked Lee group of traitors dared hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK held in deep respect by the service personnel and people of the DPRK like Heaven. For the DPRK nothing is greater sin than this crime. It will make neither slightest compromise nor connivance over the issue related to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have already put traitor Lee and puppet military warmongers within an optical sight.     As the warmongers decided to fight against the DPRK at any cost, the DPRK will give full play to the might of Songun and turn bases of provocateurs including Seoul and Inchon into seas in flames and thus put a definite end to the tragic history of national division. The DPRK will continue its sacred war with main emphasis on physical attack till all acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK are brought to a definite end and Lee Myung Bak and military warmongers and other culprits are punished without mercy in the name of the nation and the group of traitors make an apology to the nation for their high treason. The DPRK never makes an empty talk.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Most Hideous Provocation Assailed
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Most Hideous Provocation Assailed 
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Hooligans of a south Korean army unit in Inchon carelessly hang portraits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu on walls and doors, scrawling unspeakable defamatory words above and below them. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					 This is the thrice-cursed hooliganism committed by those who are bereft of even elementary etiquette and morality and the gravest politically motivated provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 The recent ceaseless hideous provocations are products of the premeditated anti-DPRK smear campaigns staged by the Lee Myung Bak group. The south Korean authorities, too, must know well that how deeply the army and people of the DPRK revere their leaders and hold them in high esteem. Nevertheless, they caused such most serious case. The above-said facts indicate that their provocations are deliberate and premeditated actions to rattle nerves of the DPRK and drive the inter-Korean relations to an uncontrollable catastrophe. 
					
					 The recent case is a continuation of the ceaseless provocations made by the south Korean authorities against the DPRK in a bid to bring the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse and ignite a war of aggression against the north and their height. 
					
					 The above-said provocation perpetrated by villains of the puppet army under the prevailing touch-and-go situation is something which can be perpetrated only by those keen to ignite a war. 
					
					 The service personnel of the strong revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu are anxiously waiting for an order to wipe out the sworn enemy Lee group of traitors. All of them are bound to be finished off by the arms of the DPRK.

articles.title: Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Attacked
articles.content:
Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Attacked
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Foreign countries issued statements between Feb. 27 and 29 to condemn the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises, Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					 The Workers' Party of Bangladesh in a statement denounced the U.S. and south Korea for their provocative and aggression-oriented Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					
					 The current exercises are an encroachment upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and an act of undisguisedly wrecking the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, the statement said, demanding the U.S. and south Korea stop at once the reckless military provocations and war maneuvers against the DPRK.
					
					 The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt in a statement called upon all the peace-loving people and progressive forces of the world to strongly condemn the aggression-oriented war exercises against the DPRK and positively support the Korean people's just struggle.
					
					 The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, the All India Agricultural Workers' Union, the All India Peasants' Union and the All India Federation of Lawyers in their joint statement noted that the war exercises of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers are, in essence, a silent declaration of war against the DPRK.
					
					 The sacred war of the army and people of the DPRK will totally wipe out the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers with means of strong strike the world has not ever known, the statement stressed.

articles.title: High Treason of Traitor Lee Myung Bak Censured by Chongryon Vice-Chairman
articles.content:
High Treason of Traitor Lee Myung Bak Censured by Chongryon Vice-Chairman
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), issued a statement on March 3 to condemn the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for committing again high treason such as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 The Lee group is the sworn enemy whom we cannot live under the same sky and the warmongers of the puppet military are bandits of traitors whom we should wipe out at any cost, the statement said.
					
					 The prevailing situation is calling upon all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to wage a struggle to bury the group for good and all, it noted, and went on:
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will turn out as one in the nationwide struggle to wipe out the bandits of heinous traitors who are driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war while getting hell-bent on the sycophancy and treachery and moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The Koreans in Japan, who have taken the road of patriotism, keeping pace with the motherland, will greatly contribute to making a breakthrough for independent reunification, holding the dear respected Kim Jong Un as the supreme leader and lodestar of reunification in high esteem.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Slam Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Slam Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Japanese authorities searched offices of the Korean Scientists and Technologists Association in Japan and the Korean Amateur Athletes Federation in Japan, charging that they violated "law on foreign exchange control". The organizations are central institutions under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Chongryon officials issued statements denouncing the authorities' crackdown on the organizations.
					
					 Hwang Chol Hong, chief of the Korean Scientists and Technologists Association in Japan, branded the search as a politically-motivated crackdown to create atmosphere against the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 Ri Chong Gyong, director of the Standing Council of the Korean Amateur Athletes Federation in Japan, denounced the Japanese authorities for suppressing the organization which has been working for friendship and exchange in sports field for the sports development of fellow countrymen. 
					
					 Song Kong Myong, chairman of the Itabashi Branch of Tokyo Metropolis under Chongryon, insisted that providing procedures for Koreans hoping to visit homeland is a routine work for the convenience of compatriots and it does not fall foul of the Japanese laws as it is a humanitarian work. 
					
					 However, the authorities mobilized police to search the office. This is an unprecedented abuse of power, he said. 
					
					 Han Jong Chi, director of the Chugai Travel Agency, slammed the search that has been carried out on account of the agency's sale of flight tickets to Koreans visiting homeland.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Make Apology and Reparation for Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Make Apology and Reparation for Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. made public a statement on March 1 urging Japan to make an apology and reparation for its crimes committed against the Korean people in the past. 
					 The Japanese authorities are working hard to tamper with history and grab Tok Islets, revealing their ambition for reinvasion, far from making an apology and reparation for them, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the anti-DPRK, anti-Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan) campaign in Japan has reached an extreme phase as evidenced by the recent repressive racket against the offices of the Korean Scientists and Technologists Association, the Korean Amateur Athletes Federation in Japan, Chugai Travel Agency under Chongryon, etc. 
					
					 The statement demanded the Japanese authorities stop at once the suppression of Koreans in Japan and make an apology and reparation for the past crimes.

articles.title: Koreans' Organization in Japan Slams DPRK-Targeted War Drills
articles.content:
Koreans' Organization in Japan Slams DPRK-Targeted War Drills
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification Ri Tong Je in a statement Friday slammed the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers' military drills for war against the DPRK.
					 The on-going military drills are not "annual defense-oriented ones" but reckless war rehearsal apparently aimed to bring down the DPRK during mourning period, the statement said.
					
					 The statement called for immediately ending the warmongering drills targeting the DPRK.
					
					 Clear is the fate awaiting the group of traitors.
					
					 The statement called on the nation to turn out to open a decisive phase for reunification by its concerted efforts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition opened at a national museum in Ulan-Ude, capital of Buryatiya, Russia, on Feb. 24 to mark the birth anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 On display in the venue were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos of their exploits, photos of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un standing together, those of the DPRK-Russia friendship and cooperation relations, books and photos of Songun Korea and handicraft works associated with the creative wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il in the name of the Ministry of Culture of Buryatiya and the Administration of Ulan-Ude.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The minister of Culture said:
					
					 The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il was a close friend of the people of Russia and Ulan-Ude.
					
					 The achievements gained by the Korean people under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il are really wonderful.
					
					 I am sure that the Korean people will always win victories under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The envoy to the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Buryatiya and the vice mayor of Ulan-Ude said that the exhibition will make a positive contribution to boosting the cultural relations between the two countries.

articles.title: DPRK's Just Stand Favored
articles.content:
DPRK's Just Stand Favored
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on Feb. 28 in support of the statements issued by spokespersons of the National Defence Commission and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK.
					 He noted that the situation in and around the Korean Peninsula is getting extremely tense due to the provocative Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers. 
					
					ã€€He went on:
					
					 The large-scale war exercises kicked off during the mourning period in the DPRK are an insult to the noble national feelings of the Korean people as well as a grave threat to the peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity and the rest of the world.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to stifle the DPRK by force and, at the same time, realize its wild ambition for world supremacy through military siege and containment of its surrounding countries.
					
					 The U.S. should be mindful that no force on earth can match the unity of the Korean service persons and people rallied in one mind around Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader, and immediately put an immediate halt to the war gambling. The south Korean authorities should stop serving it.
					
					 The IIJI fully supports the just stand of the DPRK laid down in the statements of the spokespersons for the DPRK NDC and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs on behalf of the Juche idea followers all over the world.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia provocacion anti-RPDC del traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia provocacion anti-RPDC del traidor Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 4 la siguiente declaracion denunciando las provocaciones sin precedentes de la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak contra la RPDC:
					Esta camarilla volvio a cometer una provocacion nunca vista nadando a contrapelo de la aspiracion del pueblo coreano y el mundo a la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Insatisfecho con sus ejercicios belicos desarrollados junto con las fuerzas extranjeras en el periodo de gran duelo nacional, calumnio hasta la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, lo cual causa gran indignacion del ejercito y pueblo de esta. 
					
					La banda de Lee, que se entrega a la campana conflictiva anti-RPDC calumniando hasta a los grandes lideres a quienes el pueblo coreano confia como el cielo, es la horda de traidores con quienes no podemos convivir bajo el mismo cielo. 
					
					Los traidores surcoreanos describen los ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC, repudiados y denunciados por todo el mundo, como los entrenamientos defensivos anuales, pero a traves de la presente provocacion se ha revelado claramente su intencion agresiva de atacar a la RPDC. 
					
					Lee Myung Bak, enemigo de la nacion y fuente de guerra, llevo las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas a la fase irremediable desafiando a la era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio, interrumpio todos los dialogos inclusive las conversaciones a 6 bandas y persiguio la agravacion de la tension. 
					
					Se desespero por impedir el ambiente de dialogo en la Peninsula Coreana y, al ver un avance en las conversaciones RPDC-EE.UU., hace ultimos esfuerzos por romperlas y mantener su vida restante. 
					
					Mientras que existe la banda de Lee que considera la confrontacion fratricida como su unico modo de subsistencia, no se mejoraran las relaciones intercoreanas, ni se preservaran la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y de la region, sino se acercara el nubarron de la guerra. 
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo ya sentenciaron a muerte al traidor Lee, denunciado por toda la humanidad progresista por sus tremendos crimenes intolerables, y la castigaran despiadadamente a nuestro estilo. 
					
					La defensa a ultranza del lider es el principio supremo de la RPDC, que no se cambiara nunca aunque se cambie cientos de veces el mundo y habra ni una concesion en ese tema. 
					
					Quienes amparen aun en lo minimo a la horda de Lee, que se sometera a la severa sentencia de la historia, se hallaran en el mismo destino tragico.

articles.title: CRPP advierte a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
CRPP advierte a la banda de Lee Myung Bak 
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 4 una declaracion denunciando a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak que con la extremada hostilidad y odio a la parte connacional escribio las letras insultantes bajo los retratos de los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu, considerados como vida de nuestro pueblo.
					El texto integro va como sigue: 
					
					En la historia de la humanidad estan registrados muchos tiranos infames o los histericos de guerra, pero no hubo otro tan bestial como el traidor Lee que cometio tales atrocidades contra la parte connacional. 
					
					Este crimen antietico sin precedente horroriza al mundo en esta epoca culta del siglo XXI y muestra el climax de las atrocidades abominables. 
					
					Es por eso que el ejercito y pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dicen con gran indignacion: "debemos matar a palazos a quienes insultaron la maxima dignidad de la RPDC", "debemos condenarlos a la horca" y "debemos convertir su baluarte en el mar de fuego". 
					
					En el circulo social surcoreano tambien se alzan las voces de denuncia calificando ese crimen de un "proceder imprudente y peligroso que contraviene a la conviccion de los compatriotas norcoreanos que consideran como su vida al Maximo Dirigente". 
					
					La banda de Lee Myung Bak cometio tremendos crimenes imperdonables durante el periodo de gran duelo nacional por el deceso del padre de la nacion y volvio a cometer otro crimen horrible, lo cual muestra que los traidores surcoreanos son enemigos jurados. 
					
					El presente caso no es una conducta de algunos lacayos de las unidades del ejercito titere, sino es una provocacion intencional inventada por el traidor Lee, colmado de locura conflictiva anti-RPDC, y por los cabecillos de la capa militar como el ministro de Defensa Nacional, Kim Kwan Jin, y el jefe de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor del ejercito titere, Jong Sung Jo, gangsteres de guerra. 
					
					Tal proceder parte de la intencion de aumentar entre los civiles y militares surcoreanos la hostilidad a la RPDC y lanzarlos a la confrontacion fratricida y al campo de guerra contra ella y realizar la retoma del poder agrupando a las fuerzas conservadoras en visperas de las "elecciones generales". 
					
					Ya hace mucho tiempo los compinches de la banda de Lee dejaron de ser connacionales y se convirtieron en escorias humanas. 
					
					El traidor Myung Bak y sus coparticipes realizaron el ano pasado en los campos de entrenamiento del ejercito titere y las fuerzas armadas de reserva los ejercicios de tiro tomando por blancos los simbolos de la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y colocaron en los cuarteles, puertas y paredes de unidades militares las consignas que insultan la dignidad de ella para que los soldados gritaran las consignas anti-RPDC en las horas de levantarse, acostarse, entrenar y comer. 
					
					Esta vez se ha revelado claramente que la banda de Lee habla por una parte del "dialogo" y de la "flexibilidad", pero, por la otra, se desespera por danar a la Direccion de la Revolucion de la RPDC. 
					
					Lejos de tratar con los maniacos de confrontacion como ella, no los dejaremos subsistir en este territorio. 
					
					El insulto a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC es el atentado a la vida de nuestro ejercito y pueblo. 
					
					Ahora los militares y civiles de la RPDC estan indignados por la provocacion imperdonable de la banda de traidores y tienen el impetu de aniquilarla.
					
					El mundo vera claramente que horrible seria la explosion de su indignacion. 
					
					!Ordene, el lider!
					
					Nuestros militares y civiles entraron en la disposicion de combate ajustando sus palpitaciones a los pasos del gran General Insigne del monte Paektu.
					
					Ya se ha declarado la guerra sagrada. 
					
					La banda de Lee Myung Bak, veneno humano, fuente de maldad y horda de traidores, es el primer objeto de sentencia de la nacion y no evadira el destino mas tragico. 
					
					Como hemos aclarado solemnemente en la declaracion del portavoz de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea, castigaremos indiscriminadamente a quienes denigran aun en lo minimo nuestra dignidad. 
					
					Los traidores surcoreanos deben tener presente que terrible seria el golpe del tigre indignado del monte Paektu.

articles.title: Militares y civiles capitalinos denuncia al traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Militares y civiles capitalinos denuncia al traidor Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en la capitalina Plaza Kim Il Sung un mitin de militares y civiles de denuncia a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					Estuvieron presentes los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y  el Poder, las entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior  del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de los sectores de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes en la capital, los compatriotas que se encuentran actualmente en la patria, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista (FDNA) en Pyongyang.
					
					Fueron invitados tambien los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros.
					
					Se dio lectura a la declaracion del portavoz de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC y hubo intervenciones.
					
					Pronuncio el discurso, en representacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del buro politico y secretario, del CC del PTC y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					El dijo que todos los capitalinos y otros habitantes del pais esperan la orden de aniquilar despiadadamente a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak que insulto nuestra maxima.
					
					La difamacion a nuestra maxima dignidad es un alboroto desesperado de los malvados enemigos, escorias humanas encaminado a denigrar el sol del cielo, senalo y anadio que las maniobras de enfrentamiento fratricida de la banda Lee Myung Bak deviene la extrema barbariedad nunca vista en los tiempos pasados.
					
					Aniquilaremos a todos los traidores para que no insulten por mas tiempo nuestra maxima dignidad y digno regimen.
					
					En representacion de los oficiales y soldados del EPC hizo uso de la palabra el coronel general O Kum Chol, subjefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC. 
					
					El orador enfatizo que los militares del EPC mataran a todos los promotores del presente crimen, aunque ellos esten en Inchon, Seul, isla Jeju o en el territorio estadounidense, y convertiran el bastion de esos perros rabiosos en su tumba. 
					
					Los traidores surcoreanos probaran como son los fusiles del Songun y el mundo vera claramente cuan tragico es el fin del destino de los provocadores en la guerra sagrada e indiscriminada de nuestro ejercito levantado para defender a costa de la vida a su lider, su Comandante Supremo.
					
					El delegado de la Guardia Roja Obrero-Campesina y obrero de la Fabrica de Alambres Electricos 326 de Pyongyang, Kim Hyok Nam, expuso tambien la decision de matar con los fusiles del Songun, los martillos y hoces al imbecil Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					Todos los miembros de la Guardia Roja Obrero-Campesina esperan la orden de convertir en cenizas Chongwadae, sede del traidor Lee Myung Bak, y aniquilar el nido de la campana intrigante anti-RPDC y de maniobras de provocacion de guerra, asevero. 
					
					El delegado de los jovenes y estudiantes, Hong Kang Min, estudiante de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, exhorto a todos los jovenes y estudiantes a convertirse en 5 millones de fusiles y bombas para defender a costa de la vida al Maximo Dirigente  Kim Jong Un, destino de la nacion y bandera de todas las victorias. 
					
					La contingente juvenil, reserva de combate y tropa especial del Comandante Supremo, estara al frente de la guerra sagrada e indiscriminada al estilo coreano  basada en el ataque fisico para aniquilar completamente al traidor Lee Myung Bak y los bribones militares surcoreanos y manifestar el impetu de la vanguardia juvenil de Corea crecida en el regazo de los generales insignes del monte Paektu, apunto. 
					
					Los participantes gritaron llenos de indignacion las consignas como "Maten a Lee Myung Bak", "Matemos a palazos a los belicistas de la capa militar", "Matemos al traidor Lee Myung Bak a nombre de la nacion". 
					
					 Al termino de intervenciones, hubo una manifestacion multitudinaria de denuncia a la banda traidora Lee Myung Bak.
					
					Gritando las consignas como "Seamos balas y bombas en la defensa a ultranza al querido camarada Kim Jong Un", los manifestantes marcharon por la carretera de la  plaza con la firme determinacion de cumplir con brillantez la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu y la historica causa de la reunificacion de la patria siguiendo la orientacion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Pueblo coreano castigara duramente a Lee Myung Bak, apunta ACNC
articles.content:
Pueblo coreano castigara duramente a Lee Myung Bak, apunta ACNC
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Pasan el limite las maniobras provocativas de la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Lanzo a los gangsteres militares estacionados en la ciudad de Inchon a calumniar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC. 
					
					Este crimen antinacional y anti-RPDC lleva a la fase irremediable la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Anteriormente, hubo en el Sur de Corea el dictador de "renovacion", que se torno connotado por su campana de enfrentamiento fratricida, el maton fascista militar y el sirviente politico a grandes potencias. Pero, ellos no se habian atrevido a ofender la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, porque el ejercito y pueblo coreanos la consideran como la dignidad y honor comunes de la nacion mas preciosos que la vida. 
					
					Los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu, maxima dignidad de la RPDC, son generales de acero, defensores de la justicia y salvadores de la reunificacion de la patria quienes defendieron y glorificaron la soberania de la RPDC y el destino de la nacion desde las agresiones de toda indole de los imperialistas. 
					
					Ellos son pilares de alma de los militares y civiles coreanos y banderas de victorias. 
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC tienen el temperamento de defender a costa de la vida la maxima dignidad y aniquilar despiadadamente a quienes la denigren, aunque se rompa el globo terraqueo y caiga el cielo. 
					
					Ahora juran librar la guerra de venganza para enterrar completamente a las escorias humanas como Lee Myung Bak, Kim Kwan Jin y Jong Sung Jo. 
					
					La muerte de estos mostrara a todo el mundo cuan tragico es el fin de quienes denigraron la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
